column4: Actually just running thunderbird, gnome, this gaim, firefox...That's about it. . .
Rght now I am looking at 5.0%
Has anyone noticed slowness or difficulties with the latest 1.02 ubuntu firefox?
It speaks highly of you jm^
hehe. It installed -alot- of stuff I don't need/want
Yeah, the personalization is a bit MS-ish. You can apt-get --purge remove stuff you don't want. Or go for gentoo!
yeah.. been using gentoo on workstations, and freebsd on servers till now.. wanted to try something else.. but tbh I think I'm going to go back to gentoo
You and me both jm^ - I'm running gentoo server and used this for the lappy; now I'm making lappy dual boot gentoo/ubuntu
